hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends Object
    Class for holding informations about the state of the game. The view class has a reference to an object of this class to present these informations to the user.
